transcript: I don't care. I don't care. Do you understand? I don't care if they bark if they roll over on the floor like whoops?

segments.text: I don't care. I don't care. Do you understand? I don't care if they bark if they roll over on the floor like whoops?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't care. I don't care, do you understand? I don't care if they bark, if they roll over on the floor like hoops.
